body_html:
As of e62c3a4, the error is the same.

/bin/sh: -ftree-vectorize: command not found
/bin/sh: -ftree-vectorize: command not found
/bin/sh: -ftree-vectorize: command not found
/bin/sh: -fmessage-length=0: command not found
/bin/sh: -fno-plt: command not found
/bin/sh: -fno-plt: command not found
/bin/sh: -fno-plt: command not found

To build pytorch with Anaconda cross-compilation toolchain, I am using a workaround that purges all of the 'bad' CXXFLAGS in mpicxx. I updated the use case to pin to the older version of the package that still contains these 'bad' CXXFLAGS.

body:
As of e62c3a470c4062cb64cea529b23b97e82a6ce765, the error is the same.
```
/bin/sh: -ftree-vectorize: command not found
/bin/sh: -ftree-vectorize: command not found
/bin/sh: -ftree-vectorize: command not found
/bin/sh: -fmessage-length=0: command not found
/bin/sh: -fno-plt: command not found
/bin/sh: -fno-plt: command not found
/bin/sh: -fno-plt: command not found
```

To build pytorch with Anaconda cross-compilation toolchain, I am using a workaround that purges all of the 'bad' CXXFLAGS in mpicxx. I updated the use case to pin to the older version of the package that still contains these 'bad' CXXFLAGS.
